name: pins.add
desc: Pins an item to a channel.

channel.desc: Channel to pin the messsage to. You must also include a `timestamp` when pinning messages.

timestamp.desc: Timestamp of the message to pin. You must also include the `channel`.

errors.already_pinned: The specified item is already pinned to the channel.
errors.channel_not_found: The `channel` argument was not specified or was invalid
errors.external_channel_migrating: Channel is undergoing an active migration.
errors.file_not_shared: File specified by `file` is not public nor shared to the channel.
errors.message_not_found: Message specified by `channel` and `timestamp` does not exist.
errors.no_item_specified: One of `file`, `file_comment`, or `timestamp` was not specified.
errors.not_pinnable: This message type is not pinnable.
errors.restricted_action: The user does not have permission to add pins to the channel.
